sprykerComponent.name: simple-carousel
sprykerComponent.readme:
simple-carousel (molecule)

Creates a carousel from an array of items, generating left and right arrows, as well as optional dots control.

Code sapmle

{% include molecule('simple-carousel') with {
    data: {
        slides: slides,
        showDots: true
    },
    attributes: {
        'slides-to-show': slides-to-show,
        'slides-to-scroll': slides-to-scroll
    }
} only %}

methods.name: getViewsCount
methods.description: Gets a number of the slides.

methods.name: loadPrevViewIndex
methods.description: Switches a slide to a previous one.

methods.name: loadNextViewIndex
methods.description: Switches a slide to a next one.

methods.name: loadViewIndexFromDot
methods.description: Switches a slide based on provided dot element.

methods.name: updateCurrentDot
methods.description: Toggles the active class and the modifier on the current dot.
